title: Youtube videos constantly pausing
content: I'm using Firefox (latest version) on Windows 7, Youtube videos keep pausing themselves as if they are buffering (they aren't, you can see there's some buffer available) every 5 to 10 minutes, un-pausing by pressing Space or clicking on the keyboard does nothing, I have to go backward a second or two on the Youtube timeline for the video to play again, same thing if I want to pause the video and then resume, 90% of the time I need to go backward (or forward) on the video timeline to unpause the video.

title: bookmark drop-down menu icon on the address bar disappeared
content: There used to be an icon just to the right of the star (for creating a new bookmark) on the address bar that when clicked gave a drop-down bookmark menu. For some reason it disappeared and I cannot seem to get it back. All I have been able to do is go to settings => bookmarks to get a list of bookmarks, which, however, doesn't have the bookmarks organized into the sub-categories I once had. How can I get that icon back on the address bar? I don't want to add on a bookmark bar or tool bar.

title: Saved password / logins are deleted
content:
All my saved password and login information just randomly got wiped right now. 2 seconds ago I was able to login on a site using the saved login information. After that I tried logging in on a different site and it didnt show me any saved login info. I went to settings and saw the the list is completly emptied now. I havent closed my browser in the meantime or so I am so lost please help. All I have in this list right now is the account info I just created :(

https://i.ibb.co/6sdYrgH/image.png
creator: vdabdpvhu

title: Jak zabránit otevírání již zavřených oken
content:
Dobrý den,

moje matka používá prohlížeč Firefox pro svoje brouzdání po netu. Bohužel je strašný bordelář a tak má otevřené minimálně desítky panelů v jednom okně. Krom toho, že to zpomaluje přohlížeč, tak to zpomaluje logicky i PC. Ale kvůli tomu nepíšu. Stává se jí, že když už nějaké okno zavře, po resetu/vypnutí-zapnutí PC se jí opětovně otevřou i ony již zavřené stránky. Tím pádem se z toho stává nekonečný kolotoč stránek, co zhoršují situaci. Je nějaké nastavení/plugin, které by tomuto zabránilo? Logicky ona nechce vše prostě zavřít a začít s čistým štítem, protože si chce každou jednotlivou stránku projít a pak buď uložit jako záložku nebo zavřít. Budu ráda za každou radu.
creator: sevcikova.magda

title: Outlook opens new window when deleting quickly
content: When deleting emails in my Outlook account n one of the firefox tabs, if I click a little too fast it suddenly opens a new window with the next email in the list. Its never done this before till recently and its very annoying.

title: After refresh, Firefox 111.0.01 made duplicates of some bookmarks, and reordered others
content:
My browser had been showing garbled fonts on occasion over the past week. I refreshed Firefox a couple times, issue came back. I isolated a duplicate font that may have been causing the problem. That was resolved but I now I've lost the Firefox color theme I had, which apparently isn't offered anymore, but more importantly my bookmarks are a mess. Some are duplicated, some are not in the folder where they originally were, and the bookmarks sidebar looks different. The bookmark setup looks correct in the Library window. Can I get that layout back somehow? I do have many bookmarks.

Thanks for the help.
creator: jostarla3

title: High CPU Usage after logged into SYNC, even with just ONE TAB open.
content:
Hey people!

Stuck with an issue. Need your help. Tried all the documented troubleshoot options - like refreshing, disabling hardware acceleration, Recommended Performance, troubleshoot mode, etc.

New installation. Worked fine. Logged into Firefox Account for Sync. Since then, High CPU usage even with no tabs open. No clue why.

This is the profiler report: https://share.firefox.dev/3Khzq1C

Still stuck on 35%-50%-60% CPU usage with just one tab. And just a new blank tab!

The profiler report, if can be decoded in laymen terms, as to what activity is causing so much CPU usage, will be of immense help.
creator: sharwanr
